original_title: 超!! 怖い心霊ビデオ 7
overview: The seventh installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. In order to investigate the actual situation of young people who do not work, they visit the home of the interviewee and interview the current situation and way of thinking, but if you continue to interview, the site will be wrapped in a disturbing atmosphere. And at that moment!! A psychic phenomenon of fear will occur!!
tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 7
